website_summaries.verdict: Made from 100 percent natural umbrian clay, this all-natural bar from a trusted brand is known for its purifying and deep cleansing qualities.
pros: Works well to cleanse skin as a mask in addition to a bar
Gentle enough for regular use on sensitive or acne-prone skin
The bar lasts through many uses
cons: Thin consistency and may not yield noticeable results for dry skin types

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job removing my dead and dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Anthony since the first time I picked up their bar of soap at Nordstroms. Happy to see Amazon carries all their products. This is an Exfoliating and does a good job removing dead skin (living in Vegas my skin gets very dry and exfoliating is essential). I use the bar every 2-3 days and it does a great job. It is not as grainy as the Kiehl's Exfoliating bar but the pleasant smell of citrus from the Anthony bar makes it my top choice when I need an Exfoliating bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: W. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, even if a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but this its by far the best exfoliating bar I've ever used. I don't believe miild fragrance is a problem for those whop prefer unscented. But what makes this bar rock is the jojoba bits that actually do exfoliate! Large sized bar at first may challenge some with smaller hands, but this product works well and wears well.Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Champ

customer_reviews.title: Better than Keihls
customer_reviews.text: One time user of Keihls soap for men. Decided to try Anthony’s and the cleansing ability and aroma are very refreshing and superior. Will stick with Anthony
customer_reviews.author: DougD

customer_reviews.title: Addicting Product - Fantastic Cleansing Bar
customer_reviews.text: I have been addicted to this product for three years. Yes, it's a bit pricey but the results are worth every penny and the bar lasts a very long time. Great to use and an invigorating clean!! Try it. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: David Tilkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacements came in today thank you for making sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome replacements came in today thank you for making sure everything is right at the end of the day ! The scent isn’t strong but hey it’s a detoxing bar to clean yourself your not supposed to lean on its fragrance . But it does smell great !
customer_reviews.author: Nails by The Male

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates with drying out your skin. Very nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: A great soap for exfoliating without drying out your skin. Very nice scent. Unlike other soaps the grains inside soap do not catch and stick to hair. The price is higher than others on the market though.
customer_reviews.author: Neal P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t lather well and doesn’t smell that good. Especially for the price it could be way better
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SOAP
customer_reviews.text: I received this soap as a trial in one of those monthly boxes I used to pay for. I must say, its a long lasting soap, and the scrubbing sands are GREAT addition to it. The scent is also wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Naidu

customer_reviews.title: by far this best bar of soap I have ever tried leaves skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Working outside doing construction work with the all the dust, dirt and weather elements my face/body needs some exfoliating, by far this best bar of soap I have ever tried leaves skin feeling fresh and clean. But a little pricey for one bar of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good soap, exfoliating particles too big.
customer_reviews.text: Good lathering soap but exfoliating particles too big for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne D Wells

customer_reviews.title: This product has replaced all of my cleansers
customer_reviews.text: This product has replaced all of my cleansers. Great lather, aroma and clean feeling...
customer_reviews.author: Sean H. Conyette

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Soap Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you want in a bar of soap, I have a hard time using any other soap now
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, tho with a price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap, tho not the price. It’s very slow to dissolve, I like the exfoliating qualities, and love the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nemec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive imo but love the product and will continue using.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and leaves my skin soft. Another Anthony product that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Bret A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Anthony products, including the face soap, for several years. Their products are the best on the market of the many that I have tried. A bit on the expensive side, but well worth the price. The fragrance, especially the grapefruit is mild and fantastic. Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: William Verniero

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning soap that leaves your skin soft
customer_reviews.text: It's the best soap I have used in many years. Makes your skin soft and doesn't wear out too fast. Everyone in my family uses it. Wish they provide a volume discount.
customer_reviews.author: Lousy Phone

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife introduced me to this product and we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: The Anthony Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar, (Grapefruit) is a good exfoliating cleansing bar, but it currently costs over twice as much as the exfoliating cleansing bars I normally use. On the positive side, it lathers and exfoliates well. It also has a pleasant smell. If price doesn't matter to you, then this product does its job well. I'm going to stick with current exfoliating cleansing bars though.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Clean hands and soft skin
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap that soothes my rough dry hands. The Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar leaves my hands moisturized and free of roughness. The bar has a wonderful aroma yet not overpowering. I love the ingredients and like that it is free of unnecessary ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap with mild exfoliating function
customer_reviews.text: This is great feeling and working premium soap. Mild and pleasant grapefruit smell.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Horner

customer_reviews.title: For those who like it rough :)
customer_reviews.text: This exfoliating soap did the trick. I brought it to a resort since I knew I would need to scrub off a lot of sunscreen and it absolutely did. I would say the microbeads are a little rough for everyday use if you don’t have rough skin. Scent was so-so but I wish the grapefruit was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap, mild scent
customer_reviews.text: This soap is very nice. It lathers well and feels like it cleans well. The scent is not overwhelming but it's there and smells nice. The exfoliating part is actually pretty good. I like the bigger pieces and it feels like it does a good job over all. The packaging is not what I would call enticing, but it does the job. No irritations.
customer_reviews.author: Morley Dotes

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing with luscious lather
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this bar, and I love the generous size as well. I found the bar lasted a long time, too. It lathers very well and overall it's very satisfying to use. The exfoliation makes no difference to me, since I use a washcloth in the bath, but if I used this as a hand soap I think it'd be a nice help to getting my hands clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jeddy 3

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I'm not a bodywash person but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I'm not a bodywash person but I wanted a scrubber that didn't grown mold like a loofah - this bar was perfect. The beads do a great job, and it smells like grapefruit instead of some flower or lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: exfoliating soap, light scent
customer_reviews.text: My husband has oily skin and he liked this exfoliating soap. He said it leaves skin feeling refreshed but not dry. He normally hates to have fragrance in anything, but the scent on this one is light enough not to irritate him too much. The bar is pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: OnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: My friend is a lab tech at the factory so I get them for free but I think I would pay $17 dollars a bar because it is just that good.
customer_reviews.text: Kick ass Soap, used it today from head to toe and I feel refreshed. My friend is a lab tech at the factory so I get them for free but I think I would pay $17 dollars a bar because it is just that good.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Best bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it's made out of sandpaper which is a good thing. Way too expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: SamDeKyro

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and ex-foliates well. Seems to be fairly gentle on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

product_meta.title: Anthony Exfoliating and Cleansing Bar, Grapefruit, 7 Oz, Contains Jojoba, Shea Butter, Squalane and Coconut Oils, Moisturizes Exfoliates and Soothes Skin
product_meta.description: Anthony Exfoliating & Cleansing Bar is essential in your daily routine of cleansing. Jojoba spheres exfoliate. Shea Butter, Squalene, and Coconut Oil moisturize. Cucumber extract soothes skin, while essence of Grapefruit refreshes senses. Can be used in shaving as well.
feature_bullets: Designed to thoroughly cleanse skin from head to toe, our Exfoliating + Cleansing Bar uses coconut derived surfactants to lather to rinse away excess oil and impurities.
Elevating the traditional bar soap, this face and body bar exfoliates while it cleans, sloughing away dull, dead skin cells without causing any irritation.
How to Use: Moisten the bar with water. Massage onto wet skin in a circular motion to create a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly.
Key Ingredients: Jojoba spheres gently exfoliate. Shea butter, squalene and coconut oil moisturize. Cucumber extract soothes and cools skin. Grapefruit essence awakens senses.

Claims: Free of parabens, phtalates, GMOs, DEA, triclosan, and gluten. Allergy and dermatologist tested. Made cruelty free in the USA. A portion of Anthony proceeds are donated to nonprofit organizations dedicated to eradicating Prostate Cancer.
